name: 【NekoGakuen】《MatthiolaReverieVerse:LostIsland》
description:
NekoGakuen is a team that produces free RPG and AVG games.
Currently, the team's representative game is "Singspiel", a puzzle-based fairy tale game.
We are now working on creating more games.
If you are interested in our other works, please feel free to visit us on Twitter.

This is a love story about a bullying girl, how to survive in this world like an isolated island.
Players can experience the situation of an isolated student, how to get along with others in school.

When the young girl came back to her senses, she found herself in the middle of an isolated island.
The oppressive sky, the cold air, the malicious classroom.
The things that you are used to every day are no longer acceptable.
The young girl silently made a decision.
How about making a slight change?
If everything remained the same for the last three days.
She will not try anymore.

Game Time: About 40 to 60 minutes
Endings:True End x1、Normal End x2、Bad End x1
Production Team: 小喵、蘋蘋、Papernight、Shiro、Dot、Mag、矓矓矓、Tsun Tsai、Mirai




Since our game is not profitable, we do not have enough funds to hire professional translators.
At present the game is translated by computer except Traditional Chinese.
Therefore, the current translation cannot accurately proofread the manuscript. If possible, please report the mistakes to us.
